dimensions: Warp x Weft: 71 x 74 cm (27 15/16 x 29 1/8 in.)
title: Chintz
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for black, 2 reds and 2 purples applied by pen and brush. Yellow and blue applied by brush, used together for green (chintz).
description: Lace-like curves with floral sprays and bouquets. Design is a response to European fabrics of about 1760.
name: Chintz
